Name: Talevania
About the game: Find yourself in a mysterious dungeon! People have always been drawn to the unknown. Many were driven by interest, and many by greed. Go on an adventure, together with the main character you have to go through a lot of Dangers to find dungeon treasures. Talevania is an action-packed Metroidvania platform game with ever-changing Cards and intense action. The game won't let you relax 'cause you'll never know what to expect ahead. Be brave! Experience a variety of combat mechanics. Dodge and hit the enemies! Learn to defeat the toughest opponents. Have patience and courage before you go to the dungeon, because there is waiting for you. Many enemies and traps.
